description: Google Cloud Platform engineering and migration services as Google Cloud First Managed Services Partner delivering landing zone architecture, VM migration, SAP workload moves, and BigQuery analytics

name: FinOps Optimization Delivery Department
description: Customer-facing FinOps optimization delivery executing Optimizer+ automated cost insights, FinOps Core Accelerator 4-month sprints, and GainShare guaranteed savings generating 20%+ cloud cost reduction

name: Rackspace Fabric Engineering Department
description: Proprietary Rackspace Fabric software platform engineering providing unified multi-tenant governance, ticketing, billing, authentication, tagging, and automation across customer multicloud estates with 20+ years architecture heritage

name: Rackspace Cloud Management Platform Department
description: RMC next-gen cloud management platform launched August 2025 under Senior Director Mike Lindbert delivering full-stack observability, intelligent application optimization, SLA adherence, and flexible consumption-based model

name: Elastic Engineering Pods Department
description: Elastic Engineering pod delivery operations deploying 9-person expert teams (Engagement Manager, Lead Cloud Architect, Cloud Architect, and engineers) embedded with customers via sprint-based agile methodology

name: Platform Essentials Department
description: Platform Essentials managed service tier providing 24x7 Rackspace cloud expertise, tooling, automation, and consolidated control panel as baseline service combinable with additional service blocks

name: Cloud Certification & Training Department
description: Cloud certification program management maintaining 11,000+ certifications across AWS, Microsoft, Google Cloud, and VMware for 1,700+ cloud engineers spanning Linux, Windows, and VMware specializations

name: Cloud Office Operations Department
description: Cloud Office platform operations managing Rackspace Email, Hosted Microsoft Exchange, and Office 365 services with Cloud Office Control Panel, self-service migration tools, and email archiving

name: Email Migration Services Department
description: Complimentary email migration services team with MigrationWiz tooling and self-service migration tool in Cloud Office Control Panel supporting IMAP, Exchange, and Office 365 migrations at no charge

name: Incident Response & Cyber Recovery Department
description: Critical incident response operations including lessons learned from December 2022 Hosted Exchange ransomware incident, driving investments in cyber recovery architecture and Rubrik-based immutable backup solutions

name: Sustainability & ESG Department
description: Corporate sustainability program achieving SBTi-validated near-term and net-zero 2045 targets with 10% total emissions reduction, 80% renewable-powered data centers via RE100 membership, PPAs, and RECs across 40+ global facilities

name: Rackspace Foundation Department
description: Corporate social responsibility foundation with $8M+ raised for education supporting 10,000+ STEM students, 23,000 volunteer hours logged annually, $160,000 raised for local causes, and 40 hours volunteer time off per employee

name: Responsible AI Governance Department
description: Responsible AI governance leadership co-authoring SustainableIT.org IT Toolkit for Responsible and Sustainable AI, achieving 95% employee AI-ready certification, and embedding ethical AI principles into FAIR service delivery

name: Supply Chain Sustainability Department
description: Sustainable supply chain management ensuring environmental standards, social governance, and circular IT lifecycle policy compliance across hardware, software, and service provider procurement

name: Data Center Energy & Facilities Department
description: Data center energy efficiency and facilities management deploying smart building automation, DFW power reduction of 1,700 MWh, and renewable energy procurement programs across owned and leased facilities

name: SAP Practice Department
description: SAP environment migration, management, and modernization services delivering accelerated SAP-to-cloud transitions including 70-day Coinstar migration and 2-month Niterra SAP ECC-to-Google Cloud migration

name: ServiceNow Practice Department
description: ServiceNow implementation, integration, and managed services creating complete ITSM platforms with integrations to JIRA, Salesforce, Splunk, SAP, Slack, email, and Rackspace Core Ticketing System

name: Dynamics 365 Practice Department
description: Microsoft Dynamics 365 CRM and ERP implementation, customization, and managed services providing sales, customer acquisition, customer service, and back-end operations intelligence integrated with Office 365

name: SaaS Optimization Department
description: SaaS ERP and CRM application optimization services for Oracle Cloud ERP, Microsoft Dynamics 365, and Salesforce delivering configuration, day-to-day management, and spend reduction

name: Application Integration Department
description: SaaS application and data integration services connecting on-premises, cloud, and SaaS applications with thousands of integrations delivered using technology-agnostic best practices

name: Adobe Experience Manager Practice Department
description: Adobe AEM digital experience platform implementation and management delivering scalable, reliable, and secure content management solutions for enterprise customer experience optimization

name: ICE Platform Department
description: Develops and operates the Intelligent Co-pilot for the Enterprise (ICE), an internal AI co-pilot boosting productivity and effectiveness of go-to-market teams through lead identification, routine task automation, and real-time contextualized analytics for hyper-personalized customer interactions.

name: AI Private Cloud Engineering Department
description: Engineers the Rackspace AI Business platform, a fully managed private cloud solution built on Dell Servers and NVIDIA GPUs, specifically optimized for AI training and inferencing workloads with enterprise-grade security and privacy protections.

name: Channel Sales Department
description: Executes the relaunched Partner Program with Account Ownership initiative providing evergreen commissions, managing MSP, reseller, and technology advisor partner relationships with co-selling initiatives and joint account planning.

name: Partner Enablement & Marketing Department
description: Provides partner enablement tools, co-marketing initiatives, campaigns-in-a-box assets, and the RITA (Rackspace Intelligent Technology Advisor) platform to equip channel partners with ready-to-use go-to-market resources.

name: Partner Portal Operations Department
description: Operates the Partner Portal for lead registration, opportunity tracking, compensation reporting, and case management, including the Partner Help Desk for centralized partner support requests.

name: Demand Generation Department
description: Drives inbound and outbound lead generation campaigns, digital marketing programs, and pipeline development to support sales growth across Public Cloud and Private Cloud business units.

name: Diversity, Equity & Inclusion Department
description: Operates the Executive Inclusion Council and supports Racker Resource Groups (RRGs) driving workplace inclusion initiatives, including participation in events like the annual Texas Conference for Women.

name: Rubrik & Backup Technology Department
description: Delivers managed Rubrik backup, recovery, and cyber-resiliency solutions including platform administration, SaaS workload protection, and VMware/cloud integrations with CSAT and NPS-driven customer experience focus.

name: Gurgaon Delivery Center Department
description: Expanded India delivery operations in Gurgaon providing global technical support, engineering services, and customer operations as part of the world-class service delivery center with Fanatical Experience standards.

name: Hyderabad Delivery Center Department
description: Expanded India delivery operations in Hyderabad delivering technical support, cloud engineering, and managed services as part of globalized operations to meet customer needs and drive operational excellence.

name: Chief AI Officer Organization
description: P&L-accountable AI organization reporting directly to the CEO with cross-functional authority across IT, Product, Engineering, and Delivery, owning four mandates: driving internal AI productivity, building monetizable customer AI offerings, maintaining strategic market intelligence, and incubating AI IP through a lean Labs function.

name: AI Labs & IP Incubation Department
description: Focused AI intellectual property incubation function under the Chief AI Officer, developing standardized AI sales plays segmented by vertical and workload, and translating private cloud and AI runtime capabilities into packaged go-to-market motions.

name: Healthcare Division Sales Department
description: Dedicated healthcare vertical sales organization led by VP of Acquisition Sales focused on the healthcare provider segment, driving revenue growth and market share through strategic sales initiatives and long-term client relationships in the healthcare sector.

name: Government Services Sales Department
description: Government sector sales function developing and closing opportunities with government customers, leveraging Rackspace Government Solutions infrastructure, CMMC compliance capabilities, and federal contracting vehicles for new logo acquisition.

name: Cloud Security Operations Department
description: Delivers cloud security services including access management, vulnerability assessments, security posture validation, cloud architecture security, and regulatory compliance with CJIS clearance requirements, interfacing with FLR, Infrastructure Services, and OS teams.

name: Global Sourcing & Procurement Department
description: Manages enterprise procurement across technology, consulting, resource strategy, and facility management categories, using Ariba-On-Demand for contract lifecycle management with due-diligence and compliance audit functions.

name: Windows & OS Engineering Department
description: Manages Windows and operating system platform engineering, administration, and support services referenced as 'OS-Windows' function collaborating with cloud security, infrastructure services, and maintenance teams across the global delivery organization.

name: Infrastructure Services Department
description: Core infrastructure engineering and support services function managing server, storage, and compute infrastructure operations, referenced as a distinct global technical team collaborating with cloud security, FLR, and OS-Windows functions.

name: Front Line Response Department
description: First-line technical support and response function handling initial customer contact, triage, and incident routing, referenced as 'FLR' function collaborating with specialized engineering teams including cloud security and infrastructure services.

name: Uniphore Partnership Department
description: Manages the strategic technology partnership with Uniphore for conversational AI and customer engagement automation, embedded into AI positioning and sales enablement across partner relationships.

name: DACH Sales Department
description: DACH region sales organization led by Chief Sales Officer DACH and Deputy General Manager Kim Nis Neuhauss, driving new logo acquisition and account growth across Germany, Austria, and Switzerland with focus on financial services, insurance, and media verticals.

name: DACH Professional Services Department
description: Multicloud professional services team in Germany delivering strategic advisory, architecture, and engineering services across data center modernization, cloud transformation, modern workforce, and data/AI solutions with 100+ employees across Hamburg, Munich, Cologne, Dresden, and Mannheim.

name: Bright Skies Microsoft Practice Department
description: Integrated Bright Skies Microsoft practice with 14 Microsoft competencies (12 Gold) across Data Platform, Analytics, DevOps, Application Development, Cloud Platform, Data Centre, Small/Mid-Market Cloud Solutions, and Security, serving ~500 acquired customers.

name: Billing & Order Management Department
description: Manages customer billing operations, invoice processing, order management workflows, and accounts receivable functions including payment reconciliation, revenue recognition support, and billing dispute resolution.

name: Talent Acquisition Department
description: Global recruiting function leveraging AI tools to support hiring process including application review, resume analysis, and response assessment, sourcing talent for technical, sales, and corporate functions across all Rackspace regions.

name: Total Rewards & Compensation Department
description: Administers compensation programs including geographic market-based pay ranges, incentive compensation, annual bonuses, equity awards, and the Employee Stock Purchase Plan (ESPP) across all Rackspace markets.

name: Customer Portal Operations Department
description: Operates the Rackspace Customer Portal (Rackspace Fabric), Cloud Office Control Panel, Microsoft 365 Portal, and Rackspace Webmail Login interfaces providing unified ticketing, billing, governance, and tagging across multicloud environments.

name: Privacy & Data Protection Department
description: Manages global data privacy compliance including GDPR, CCPA, and other regional data protection regulations, operating the privacy notice framework, data processing agreements, and data subject rights management.

name: Quantum Computing Department
description: Partners with Munster Technological University to launch Ireland's first Quantum Cloud Platform on AWS, advancing collaborative quantum computing research and establishing Rackspace presence in emerging quantum technologies.

name: Rackspace Cloud Academy Department
description: Customer-facing cloud training and certification services providing education programs for cloud technologies, complementing the internal Rackspace University function with external training delivery and partner certification enablement.

name: UK Sovereign Cloud Operations Department
description: Operates UK Sovereign Services VMware-certified sovereign cloud platform from UK-based data centers managed by local entities, led by General Manager Rick Martire, providing fully managed private cloud for organizations requiring strict data residency, sovereignty, and regulatory compliance.

name: Public Cloud Business Transformation Department
description: Drives business transformation initiatives within the Public Cloud business unit, led by SVP Lata Varghese, focusing on operational improvement, process optimization, and strategic change management.

name: Public Cloud Services & Delivery Department
description: Manages service delivery operations for the Public Cloud business unit, led by SVP Phani Kishore Burre, overseeing managed cloud operations, SLA performance, and customer technical delivery across AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud platforms.

name: AWS Alliance Department
description: Drives the global strategic alliance partnership with Amazon Web Services, led by Global Head of AWS Alliance responsible for relationship management, product development alignment, go-to-market activities, and sales enablement programs for AWS-based solutions.

name: Productivity Engineering Department
description: Internal productivity tools and workplace technology engineering team referenced as 'Productivity' function collaborating with infrastructure services, maintenance, and cloud security teams across the global delivery organization.

name: Maintenance & Patching Department
description: Manages infrastructure maintenance operations, patch management, and scheduled maintenance windows across private cloud and managed hosting platforms, referenced as 'Maintenance' function in global technical team structure.
